settings.subheading: Choose between single-product or multi-product layout in the template selector

settings.heading: How to Switch Between Templates
settings.content:
To use Single Product Focus layout:
1. Click the page selector dropdown (says 'Home page' at the top)
2. Click 'Change template' link below it
3. Select 'index.single-product'
4. Click 'Change' to apply

To use Multi Product Store layout:
1. Click the page selector dropdown
2. Click 'Change template'
3. Select 'index.multi-product'
4. Click 'Change' to apply
